mapper.select: select bk_num, bk_amount, mem_id, ss_name, ss_img, ss_price, sl.ss_num, dv_fee from tb_basket bk join tb_sales sl on bk.ss_num = sl.ss_num join tb_delivery dv on sl.dv_num = dv.dv_num where mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_basket (ss_num, bk_amount, mem_id) values (#{ss_num}, #{bk_amount}, #{mem_id})
mapper.select: select max(dv_fee) from tb_basket bk join tb_sales sl on bk.ss_num = sl.ss_num join tb_delivery dv on sl.dv_num = dv.dv_num where mem_id = #{mem_id}
